author: breser
msg: Merge the r1479320 group from trunk:
'make -s all install distclean' would spam stdout and issue irrelevant
warnings on stderr.  (This is user-facing behaviour.)

author: breser
msg: For 'svn log -g', eliminate read requests on directories and mergeinfo
in revisions that are guaranteed to not change any mergeinfo.
This simple change combined with r1481594 resulted in a 4x speedup for
'svn log -g' in the FreeBSD repo with cold and 15x with hot caches.

author: breser
msg: Merge the r1482327 group from trunk:
Resolve segfault on upgrading from pre 1.7 working copies, where there
are local property changes or conflicts or changelist, but no tree conflict.

author: breser
msg: Speed up reporting and authz checks on copy-from info in 'svn log'.
The way we implemented merges makes replacements and add-with-history
a much more common occurance than they would otherwise be.  With this
simple change, I've witnessed a ~25% speedup for e.g. the FreeBSD repo.

author: swagle
msg: AMBARI-2124. Hive client is not getting reconfigured when it is co-hosted with hive server/metastore. (swagle)
